dungeon.game

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • dungeon.game.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Monster, Player

    public abstract class Character
extends java.lang.Object
    Etablish the caracteristics of a character It can be a monster or a player
    Author:
    Loic
